content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. As Landlord Peter Schmidt aiming to maximize my profit, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month. What figure do you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your proposed price, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering my responsible and dependable nature, I believe this apartment should be more reasonably priced given its location in the city center without any furnishings. With that perspective, I would like to propose initiating negotiations with a rental price of 950 Euros per month. Let's see if we can find common ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly undervalues my property in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. Though my intention was to seek a fair price, I respect your perspective on the apartment's value. We seem to have differing views on an acceptable rental cost, and I apologize if my offer caused any discomfort. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
